InstructionData.Title: BP - Beacon Pulser
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Beacon Pulser # Model BP-100 alias Beacon d0 # Beacon
define pw_on 4 # beacon active in ticks # e.g. 6 = 3 seconds define duty_cycle .15 # percent of time on # e.g. .25 = 25%
alias period r2 # ticks for on/off cycle alias pw_off r3 # beacon inactive in ticks alias tick_count r4 # timer alias active r5 # beacon on/off
init: div period pw_on duty_cycle trunc period period sub pw_off period pw_on
loop: mod tick_count tick_count period slt active tick_count pw_on s Beacon On active add tick_count tick_count 1 yield j loop
